Translations.Text: Yakshcho BOH torkayetʹsya vas z neharazdamy, nikhto ne mozhete relieve tse krim Vin. Ta koly Vin blahoslovlyaye vas, niyaka syla ne mozhe zavazhyty Yoho charivnosti. Vin daruye tse na whomever Vin vybyraye z chysla Yoho sluzhbovtsiv. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy

Proholoshuyutʹ: "O lyudy, pravda prybula do vas herein z vashoho Lorda. Whoever keruyetʹsya keruyetʹsya dlya yoho vlasnyy harnyy. Ta whoever ide astray, ide astray do yoho vlasnoho zbytku. YA ne zakinchuyusʹ okhoronetsʹ vy
Slidkuyete shcho vidkryvayetʹsya do vas, ta patsiyent do BOHA vydaye Yoho vyrok; Vin yavlyaye soboyu krashchoho suddyu
Tse ye svyate pysannya chyyi virshi perfected, todi vysvitlyuvalysʹ. Tse prybuvaye z duzhe Mudroho, Naybilʹsh Cognizant
Proholoshuyutʹ: "Vy ne budete obozhnyuvaty krim BOHA. YA prybuvayu do vas z Yoho yak warner, tak zhe, yak i pred'yavnyk harnoyi novyny

Vy budete shukaty vashoho forgiveness Lorda, todi budete kayatysya yomu. Vin todi blahoslovytʹ vas velykodushno dlya predetermined period, ta daruyete Yoho charivnosti na tsi khto zasluhovuyutʹ tse. Yakshcho vy prohanyayete, todi ya bo dlya vas retribution awesome dnya
Do BOHA ye vashe ostatochne vidshkoduvannya, ta Vin Omnipotent

Diysno, vony khovayutʹ yikhni nayhlybshi dumky, tak, yakby shchob utrymaty Yoho z znayuchykh yim. Faktychno, tomu shcho vony nakryvayutʹ sebe z yikhnim odyahom, Vin znaye vsi yikhni tayemnytsi ta deklaratsiyi. Vin znaye nayhlybshi dumky
